        data - 数据信息

      • getImageData

        public boolean getImageData(java.lang.String url,
                            BytesBufferPool.BytesBuffer buffer)
        从sdcard中获取内存缓存
        参数:
        url - 图片url地址
        buffer - 填充缓存区
        返回:
        是否获得图片

      • clearMemoryCache

        public void clearMemoryCache(java.lang.String key)

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the disk cache associated with this ImageCache object. Note that this includes disk access so this should not be executed on the main/UI thread.
